title: Jerry Garcia and John Kahn - 1982-06-26 - LATE Show - Warner The
description:
Jerry Garcia and John Kahn
06-26-1982 - late show
Warner Theater
Washington, DC


Source:  MSC > Cx > WAV > FLAC

Flaws:
Clipping at the start of:
- Gomorrah


Late show (complete):

01 It Takes A Lot To Laugh It Takes A Train To Cry
02 Friend Of The Devil
03 Deep Elem Blues
04 To Lay Me Down
05 Bird Song
06 Gomorrah
07 Run For The Roses
08 Oh Babe It Ain't No Lie
09 Ripple

--- Encore ---
10 Rubin And Cherise



Despite the informational gaps in the lineage, this is a fine sounding 
source and a clean transfer.

The recording is typical of the '82 Garcia/Kahn soundboards: a clear, 
warm tape with a fair amount of audience presence mixed in. As usual,
the recordist appears to have paused the master between most tracks. 
However by chance only one track is clipped in this set. 

This relative lack of flaws, and the mostly great performance quality, 
make this set a real gem.
